sql_fr_run: with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_lake.dagg_cdit_redist sa join com_us_lake.man_lov lv on sa.product_name = lv.lov_code where sa.aud_upd_dts >= date_add(date_trunc('DD',current_date),-1) and upper(LOV_DESCRIPTION)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 111) prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_lake.cnp_bd_cbk_sls sa join com_us_lake.man_lov lv on sa.product_name = lv.lov_code where sa.aud_upd_dts >= date_add(date_trunc('DD',current_date),-1) and upper(LOV_DESCRIPTION)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 112) prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_lake.udef_ic_order_adjustments sa join com_us_lake.man_lov lv on sa.product = lv.lov_code where sa.aud_upd_dts >= date_add(date_trunc('DD',current_date),-1) and upper(LOV_DESCRIPTION)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 113) prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt,  'Unit' as field_name from com_us_lake.BPRI_BillingExtract bill JOIN com_us_lake.bpri_salesordertransactions sal ON (regexp_replace(sal.doc_number, '^0+(?!$)', '') = regexp_replace(bill.Sales_document,'^0+(?!$)', '') AND regexp_replace(sal.s_ord_item, '^0+(?!$)', '') = regexp_replace(bill.Sales_doc_Item, '^0+(?!$)','')) INNER JOIN com_us_lake.bpri_materialmasterdata mat ON (sal.material=mat.material) join com_us_lake.man_lov lv on regexp_replace(mat.material, '^0+(?!$)', '') = lv.lov_code where sa.aud_upd_dts >= date_add(date_trunc('DD',current_date),-1) and upper(LOV_DESCRIPTION)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 114) prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp
select case when metric > threshold then 1 else 0 end as res from corp_us_lake.dq_output_table where entity_id in ('dq_111','dq_112','dq_113','dq_114')
